active_learning.discussion_prompt: In the context of Supply Chain Risk Management (SCRM), debate the trade-offs between detailed compliance reporting requirements (e.g., NIST CSF Govern function and metrics) and organizational agility. Use real-world examples like the SolarWinds supply chain breach or MOVEit vulnerability to argue whether over-reporting creates more risk than it mitigates, and propose balanced strategies.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
